channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Asus ROG Ally X Review: More Battery and Storage, Same Windows Problems
item.description: I still can't stand Windows on a handheld gaming console. But if you can, the ROG Ally X is leagues better than its predecessor.

item.title: The Asus ROG Ally X turns PC gaming into a portable console
item.description: A little more than a year after launching the ROG Ally, Asus is releasing a refined version of its portable device, the ROG Ally X. This Windows-based...

item.title: Staffers Were Told Biden Was Leaving Race in Email Telling Them to Check X
item.description: “Team, sharing with you the letter from President Biden that was released just now,” read an email that President Joe Biden’s campaign managers sent.

item.title: CIA AI director Lakshmi Raman claims the agency is taking a ‘thoughtful approach’ to AI
item.description: As a part of TechCrunch’s ongoing Women in AI series, which seeks to give AI-focused women academics and others their well-deserved — and overdue — ti...

item.title: Joe Biden Drops Out of 2024 Presidential Race
item.description: President Joe Biden announced Sunday that he would “stand down” from his reelection campaign.

item.title: What Kamala Harris has said about AI, tech regulation, and more
item.description: With President Joe Biden dropping out of the race, Vice President Kamala Harris may become the Democrats’ new nominee. In announcing his plans, Biden ...

item.title: The Best DAW Software Recommended by WIRED’s Resident Musicians (2024)
item.description: From Ableton and Pro Tools to iPad apps—get the most out of your music with these digital audio workstations, or DAWs.

item.title: Joe Biden drops out of presidential race
item.description: U.S. President Joe Biden has announced he no longer plans to seek reelection, a decision that follows weeks of growing pressure from some Democratic P...

item.title: Review: Strymon BigSky MX
item.description: This expensive big-box reverb strikes a stunning balance between versatility, usability, and experimentation.

item.title: Made by Google 2024: Pixel 9, Gemini, a new foldable and other things to expect from the event
item.description: Google is expected to announce four Pixel devices: the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL and Pixel 9 Pro Premium, running Android 15. © 2024 TechCr...
